data.Question: I want to log in using my organization's professional email address
I want to be able to train on the tool via an e-learning module of less than 4h for quick mastery
data.Commentaire: The complete training path currently includes 5 workshops of 5 hours each

data.Question: I want to be able to contact end-user support (L1) in English or French
data.Commentaire: Support via the solution (chat) or by email

data.Question: I want to be able to configure the application language in English or French
I want to be able to view the dashboards available to me
I want to be able to filter dashboards according to criteria (priority, company, status, date, category...)
data.Commentaire:
It is possible to build as many dashboards as desired.
Each dashboard having its indicators by priority/status/date/category.

For each dashboard there are 2 filters: the scope (the company or companies concerned) and the date.

data.Question: I want to be able to define the status of actions
data.Commentaire: An action has a status (to be planned, planned, in progress, cancelled, etc.) but also comments, a percentage of progress as well as proof documents. Evidence may be mandatory to close an action (to be defined by the administrator)

data.Question: I want to be able to be alerted of the deadline of my actions
I want to be able to add documents as evidence elements of the self-assessment
I want to be able to self-assess against a framework defined by the group and specific to my organization (Security Standard V8 + complementary measures)
I want to be able to self-assess against a framework required by another party (e.g. client, ISO certification)
I want to be able, when evaluating on one framework, to see the score in another framework even if elements are missing
data.Commentaire: The platform currently has 26 security frameworks including (ISO27x, NIST, TISAX). Other standards can be added during integration

data.Question: I want to be able to add members of my organization to my scope
data.Commentaire: Requires a pilot account (administrator) subject to license

data.Question: I want to be able to modify the rights (write/read) and access (menus, dashboards, functionalities) of members of my organization
I want to be able to define a self-assessment framework required by another party (e.g. client, ISO certification)
data.Commentaire: Provided that the framework is implemented in the platform
